page.title: 13Shopping
page.content: Beaconsfield has two main shopping areas -the Old and New Towns-with a smaller parade of shops in Holtspur.The New Town is dominated by Waitrose,a new supermarket,with its own carpark.This large site was obtained by demolishing a public house.Apart from food shops,there is a range of goods, including several boutiques, but no department stores.The shopping facilities are used by local residents and those from nearby villages and small towns.Regular shoppers in the Old Town are local residents who shop here for their everyday needs.There are also several specialist shops in the Old Town that attract customers from a wide area. These include shops selling musical instruments, silk flowers, a saddler, antique and fine reproduction furniture.Holtspur shops serve the local community.
